original_text: You are like a person who has a big piece of wood in his eye. But then he says to his friend, “Let me take that little piece of dirt out of your eye for you.”
korean_text: 보라 네 눈 속에 들보가 있는데 어찌하여 형제에게 말하기를 나로 네 눈 속에 있는 티를 빼게 하라 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: who has a big piece of wood in his eye
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 자신 눈에 큰 나무 조각이 있는

sentences.original_text: But then he says to his friend
Let me take that little piece of dirt
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그 작은 먼지 조각을 꺼내게 해주게

sentences.original_text: out of your eye for you
